trans-unit.source: Represents a panel in a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa um painel em um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"></xref> control replaces and adds functionality to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control of previous versions, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.
trans-unit.target: Embora o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip"> </xref> controle substitui e adiciona a funcionalidade para o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> controle de versões anteriores, <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> é mantido para compatibilidade com versões anteriores e o uso futuro, se você escolher.

trans-unit.source: A StatusBarPanel represents an individual panel in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: Um StatusBarPanel representa um painel individual no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>

trans-unit.source: A StatusBarPanel can contain text and/or an icon that can be used to reflect the status of an application.
trans-unit.target: Um StatusBarPanel pode conter texto e/ou em um ícone que pode ser usado para refletir o status de um aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>, accessible through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control, to retrieve, add, or remove an individual StatusBarPanel.
trans-unit.target: Use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>, acessível por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controle, recuperar, adicionar ou remover um StatusBarPanel individual.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>

trans-unit.source: The StatusBarPanel provides properties that enable you to modify the display behavior of a panel within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: O StatusBarPanel fornece propriedades que permitem que você modificar o comportamento de exibição de um painel em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> property to display an icon within a panel.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>propriedade para exibir um ícone em um painel.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property can be used to provide a graphical representation of state in an application.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade pode ser usada para fornecer uma representação gráfica de estado em um aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A> property enables you to specify how text and/or an icon is aligned within the panel.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>propriedade permite que você especifique como o texto e/ou um ícone é alinhado dentro do painel.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: To ensure that your panel is sized properly to fit the text of the panel, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> property to automatically resize the panel to fit the text of the panel or to fill the remaining space within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: Para garantir que o painel é dimensionado corretamente para acomodar o texto do painel, você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>propriedade automaticamente redimensionar o painel de acordo com o texto do painel ou para preencher o restante de espaço dentro de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A> property enables you to specify a minimum width for the panel to ensure that it does not get smaller than the data it is intended to display.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A>propriedade permite que você especifique uma largura mínima do painel garantir que ele não obtém menor do que os dados que ele é destinado a exibir.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control is typically used to display Help information or state information about your application.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controle normalmente é usado para exibir informações de Ajuda ou informações de estado sobre o seu aplicativo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: Often, it is important to display additional information about data that is presented in a panel.
trans-unit.target: Geralmente, é importante exibir informações adicionais sobre dados que são apresentados em um painel.

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A> property to display information whenever the mouse pointer rests on a panel.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>propriedade para exibir informações sempre que o ponteiro do mouse está localizada em um painel.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>

trans-unit.source: Although the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control is typically used to display textual information, you can also provide your own type of display to a StatusBarPanel.
trans-unit.target: Embora o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controle normalmente é usado para exibir informações textuais, você também pode fornecer seu próprio tipo de exibição para um StatusBarPanel.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> property enables you to specify how the StatusBarPanel will be drawn.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>propriedade permite que você especifique como o StatusBarPanel será desenhada.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> property is used to display the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A> property (and an icon, if specified in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> property).
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>propriedade é usada para exibir o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A>propriedade (e um ícone, se especificado no <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>propriedade).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>, you can draw your own information into the panel.
trans-unit.target: Se a propriedade é definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>, você pode desenhar suas próprias informações para o painel.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>

trans-unit.source: You can use this feature to draw a progress bar or an animated icon in the panel.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar esse recurso para desenhar uma barra de progresso ou um ícone animado no painel.

trans-unit.source: When you create an instance of the StatusBarPanel class, the read/write properties are set to initial values.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria uma instância da classe StatusBarPanel, as propriedades de leitura/gravação são definidas como valores iniciais.

trans-unit.source: For a list of these values, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Para obter uma lista desses valores, consulte o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.%23ctor%2A>construtor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: When you create an instance of <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, the following read/write properties are set to initial values.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria uma instância de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, as seguintes propriedades de leitura/gravação são definidas com valores iniciais.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>|`null`| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A>|10| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>|<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A>|A zero-length string.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>|A zero-length string.| |<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A>|100| You can change the value for any of these properties through a separate call to the property.
trans-unit.target: | Propriedade | Valor inicial | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment>| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle>| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>| `null`| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A>|&10; | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>| <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>| | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A>| Uma cadeia de caracteres de comprimento zero. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A>| Uma cadeia de caracteres de comprimento zero. | | <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A>|&100; | Você pode alterar o valor de qualquer uma dessas propriedades por meio de uma chamada separada para a propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.ToolTipText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Text%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BorderStyle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the alignment of text and icons within the status bar panel.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o alinhamento do texto e dos ícones no painel de barra de status.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to horizontally align the text and/or icon assigned to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A> property within the borders of the panel.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa propriedade para alinhar horizontalmente o texto e/ou ícone atribuído para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>propriedade dentro das bordas do painel.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Icon%2A>

trans-unit.source: Text and icons can be aligned to the left, right, or center of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Ícones e texto podem ser alinhados à esquerda, direita ou no Centro de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: There is no way to independently position an icon within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível posicionar independentemente um ícone em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: For example, you cannot position an icon to the left side of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> while aligning the text on the right side.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você não pode posicionar um ícone ao lado esquerdo do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>ao alinhamento de texto à direita.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: The icon is always positioned to the left side of the text regardless of how the text is aligned.
trans-unit.target: O ícone é sempre posicionado à esquerda do texto, independentemente de como o texto é alinhado.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned to the property is not a member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: O valor atribuído à propriedade não é membro do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.HorizontalAlignment"> </xref> enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the status bar panel is automatically resized.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se o painel da barra de status é automaticamente redimensionado.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> have precedence over those panels set to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>objetos definidos com <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>têm precedência sobre esses painéis definidos como o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>valor.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize></xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> that has its AutoSize property set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> is shortened if a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> with the AutoSize property set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> requires that space.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>que tem a propriedade AutoSize definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>é reduzido se um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>com a propriedade AutoSize definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>requer que o espaço.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: You can use AutoSize to ensure that the contents of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> are properly displayed in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control that contains more than one panel.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar o dimensionamento automático para garantir que o conteúdo de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>são exibidos corretamente em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>que contém mais de um painel de controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might want a panel that contains text to adjust automatically to the amount of text it is displaying (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>), while another panel on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> that displays an owner-drawn progress bar would need to be a fixed size (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>).
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, talvez seja um painel que contém o texto para ajustar automaticamente a quantidade de texto que está exibindo (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>), enquanto outro painel a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>que exibe uma barra de progresso de desenho proprietário precisa ter um tamanho fixo (<xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned to the property is not a member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: O valor atribuído à propriedade não é membro do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize"> </xref> enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Begins the initialization of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Começa a inicialização de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to start the initialization of a component that is used on a form or used by another component.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é usado para iniciar a inicialização de um componente que é usado em um formulário ou por outro componente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.EndInit%2A> method ends the initialization.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.EndInit%2A>método termina a inicialização.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.EndInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Using the BeginInit and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.EndInit%2A> methods prevents the control from being used before it is fully initialized.
trans-unit.target: Usando o BeginInit e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.EndInit%2A>métodos impede que o controle que está sendo usada antes de ser totalmente inicializado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.EndInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the border style of the status bar panel.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo da borda do painel de barra de status.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to differentiate a panel from other panels in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa propriedade para diferenciar um painel de outros painéis em uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned to the property is not a member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: O valor atribuído à propriedade não é membro do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelBorderStyle"> </xref> enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: Libera os recursos não gerenciados usados pelo <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref> e, opcionalmente, libera os recursos gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado pelo público `Dispose()` método e o <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>método.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: `Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: `Dispose()`invoca o protegido `Dispose(Boolean)` método com o `disposing` parâmetro definido como `true`.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A> invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>invoca `Dispose` com `disposing` definido como `false`.</xref:System.Object.Finalize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> references.
trans-unit.target: Quando o `disposing` parâmetro é `true`, esse método libera todos os recursos mantidos por qualquer objeto gerenciado que este <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>referências.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.
trans-unit.target: Este método chama o `Dispose()` método de cada objeto referenciado.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>para liberar recursos gerenciados e não gerenciados; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> para liberar apenas recursos não gerenciados.

trans-unit.source: Ends the initialization of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Termina a inicialização de um <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to end the initialization of a component that is used by another component.
trans-unit.target: Esse método é usado para finalizar a inicialização de um componente que é usado por outro componente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BeginInit%2A> method starts the initialization.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BeginInit%2A>método inicia a inicialização.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BeginInit%2A> and EndInit methods prevents the control from being used before it is fully initialized.
trans-unit.target: Usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BeginInit%2A>e métodos de EndInit impede que o controle que está sendo usada antes de ser totalmente inicializado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the icon to display within the status bar panel.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o ícone a ser exibido no painel de barra de status.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to display an icon that represents the state of your application or a process within your application.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa propriedade para exibir um ícone que representa o estado do seu aplicativo ou um processo dentro de seu aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can display an icon in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> to indicate whether a file save operation is in progress or complete.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode exibir um ícone em uma <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>para indicar se um arquivo de operação de gravação está em andamento ou concluída.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > There is no way to independently position an icon within the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Não é possível posicionar independentemente um ícone em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: For example, you cannot position an icon to the left side of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> while aligning the text on the right side using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você não pode posicionar um ícone ao lado esquerdo do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>ao alinhamento de texto no lado direito usando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: The icon is always positioned to the left side of the panel's text regardless of how the text is aligned.
trans-unit.target: O ícone é sempre posicionado à esquerda do texto do painel, independentemente de como o texto é alinhado.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"></xref> that represents the icon to display in the panel.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Drawing.Icon"> </xref> que representa o ícone a ser exibido no painel.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the minimum allowed width of the status bar panel within the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o mínimo permitido largura do painel de barra de status dentro do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The MinWidth property is used when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> to prevent the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> from automatically resizing to a width that is too small.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade MinWidth é usada quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>estiver definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>ou <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>para impedir que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>seja redimensionada automaticamente para uma largura que é muito pequena.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>, the MinWidth property is automatically set to the same value as the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>estiver definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize>, a propriedade MinWidth é definida automaticamente para o mesmo valor que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelAutoSize> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: The minimum width, in pixels, of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A largura mínima, em pixels, do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: A value less than 0 is assigned to the property.
trans-unit.target: Um valor menor que 0 é atribuído à propriedade.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name to apply to the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o nome para aplicar ao <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Name property corresponds to the key for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade de nome corresponde à chave para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control that hosts the status bar panel.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> controle que hospeda o painel da barra de status.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to determine the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control that a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> is contained within.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa propriedade para determinar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controlar que um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>contidos.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> objects are added to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>os objetos são adicionados a um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controle chamando o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A>método de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>classe.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar></xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection> of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control is accessible through the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controle é acessível por meio de <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.Panels%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.StatusBarPanelCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> that contains the panel.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> que contém o painel.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style of the status bar panel.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o estilo do painel de barra de status.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to indicate whether a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> displays text or whether the panel is managed as an owner-drawn <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa propriedade para indicar se um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>exibe texto ou se o painel é gerenciado como um desenho proprietário <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: To determine when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> needs to be drawn, create an event handler for the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> event of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar quando um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>precisa ser desenhado, crie um manipulador de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem>eventos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs> passed as a parameter to an event handler of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> event enables you to determine which panel needs to be drawn.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs>passado como um parâmetro para um manipulador de eventos do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem>evento permite que você determine qual painel deve ser desenhado.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar.DrawItem> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs> also provides a <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object you can use to perform drawing tasks on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs>também fornece um <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>objeto que você pode usar para executar tarefas de desenho em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarDrawItemEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Uma da <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle"> </xref> valores.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The value assigned to the property is not a member of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle"></xref> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: O valor atribuído à propriedade não é membro do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle"> </xref> enumeração.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that contains data about the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um objeto que contém dados sobre o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object> that contains data about the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object>que contém dados sobre o <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>.</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of the status bar panel.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o texto do painel da barra de status.

trans-unit.source: This property represents the text that is displayed when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade representa o texto que é exibido quando a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>propriedade é definida como <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanelStyle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Style%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to display information about your application in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar> control.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa propriedade para exibir informações sobre o seu aplicativo em um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use the Text property to display Help information when the user moves the mouse over a menu or to display the name and location of a file that is opened in an application.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode usar a propriedade de texto para exibir informações de ajuda quando o usuário move o mouse sobre um menu ou para exibir o nome e o local de um arquivo que está aberto em um aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: To align the text within a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para alinhar o texto dentro de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.Alignment%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: The text displayed in the panel.
trans-unit.target: O texto exibido no painel.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets ToolTip text associated with the status bar panel.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o texto de dica de ferramenta associado com o painel de barra de status.

trans-unit.source: You can use this property to display additional information in a ToolTip when the mouse pointer rests on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode usar essa propriedade para exibir informações adicionais em uma dica de ferramenta quando o ponteiro do mouse está localizada em <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can display a ToolTip that provides data transfer speed for a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> that displays the status of a file transfer.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode exibir uma dica de ferramenta que fornece a velocidade da transferência de dados para um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>que exibe o status de uma transferência de arquivo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: To display ToolTips for other controls in your application, use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> control.
trans-unit.target: Para exibir dicas de ferramenta para outros controles em seu aplicativo, use o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>controle.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: The ToolTip text for the panel.
trans-unit.target: O texto de dica de ferramenta do painel.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a string that contains information about the panel.
trans-unit.target: Recupera uma cadeia de caracteres que contém informações sobre o painel.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that contains the class name for the control and the text it contains.
trans-unit.target: Retorna uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o nome da classe para o controle e o texto que ele contém.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the width of the status bar panel within the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a largura do painel de barra de status dentro do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBar"> </xref> controle.

trans-unit.source: The Width property always reflects the actual width of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> and cannot be smaller than the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade Width sempre reflete a largura real de um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>e não pode ser menor do que o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: To automatically resize the width of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> to the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, you can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para redimensionar automaticamente a largura do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>ao conteúdo do <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>, você pode usar o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.AutoSize%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel>

trans-unit.source: The width, in pixels, of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A largura, em pixels, do <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The width specified is less than the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth*> property.
trans-unit.target: A largura especificada é menor que o valor da <xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth*>propriedade.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.StatusBarPanel.MinWidth*>
